activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3800
activity.text:
> Enquiring about communication channels

hey sir @viraj89  , i would like to contribute in this project as i have already build some of GEN AI applications using LLM's such as chatgpt  , Gemini models and some of local LLM's also using Ollama. I am really excited about this project contribution as i have required skills and experience regarding that. 

### Iâ€™d love to help with:

- Frontend architecture for the drag-and-drop state machine builder.
- AI-powered UI generation logic.
- Beckn Protocol API integrations.
- AI-driven natural language input processing.

I would like to apply for this project for C4GT'25 , can you provide the _discord/slack_ communication channels where we can clarify our doubts along the way of drafting proposal. 

Looking forward to collaborating!
